name: apropriacaohoras
description: API da apropriação de horas da São Paulo Urbanismo

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel-build
scripts.build:homolog: npm run clean && npm run babel-build && npm run db:reset
scripts.db:rebuild: sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:init: sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:reset: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
